title: Album, Plans, coupes, élévations des plus belles maisons et des hôtels construits à Paris et dans les environs (Plans, Forms, Elevations of the Most Remarkable Houses and Hotels erected in Paris and its Environs), 1771–1802
title_raw: Plans, coupes, élévations des plus belles maisons et des hôtels construits à Paris et dans les environs (Plans, Forms, Elevations of the Most Remarkable Houses and Hotels erected in Paris and its Environs)
medium: engraving; black ink on cream paper
provenance: From the Collection of Léon Decloux
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description:
Frontispiece, title page, Advertisement, Explication, 20 cahiers, 120 plates, Conclusion.

Architecture & plans, panels, doors, ceilings, windows,
Furniture, including beds, chairs, desks, tables, sofa, washstand, stools, bookcases.

Dessine par J. C. Krafft, et grave par N. Ransonnette a Paris chez Krafft et Ransonnette. (ca. 1802)

tombstone.epitaph: Album, Plans, coupes, élévations des plus belles maisons et des hôtels construits à Paris et dans les environs (Plans, Forms, Elevations of the Most Remarkable Houses and Hotels erected in Paris and its Environs), 1771–1802. engraving; black ink on cream paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-551.
